short_summary: Plumbing services for CFHA on behalf of DND for Crown owned portfolio
description: Please refer to tender Description field for full details
full_summary:
###  Tender Information for Plumbing Services for CFHA

#### Tender Title and Reference Number

* English Title: W3707-24-ES04 Plumbing Services - CFHA - Esquimalt
* French Title: W3707-24-ES04 Services de Plomberie - ALFC- Esquimalt
* Reference Number: WS4203621547

#### Tender Invitation Details

* Solicitation Number: WS4203621547
* Amendment Number: 2
* Amendment Date: November 6, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: November 29, 2023 at 2:00 PM EST
* Publication Date: October 19, 2023

#### Services Required

* Plumbing system maintenance or repair (Section 72101510)
* Plumbing construction services (Section 72151100)
* Plumbing or sewer inspection service (Section 81141807)

#### Notice Type and Procurement Method

* Solicitation Type: Request for Standing Offer
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding

#### Selection Criteria

* Lowest Price

#### Tendering Documents

* The tendering documents may be viewed on Ariba Discovery at the following link: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17769150?extsite=MTc3NjkxNTBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

#### Mandatory Information

* All bidders must submit their bid electronically by November 29, 2023 at 2:00 PM EST. All bids must be submitted before this deadline.
* Bidders must provide a completed esoteric Bid Form (RFP-ND STR Form). 
* Amendent conference teleconférence will be held November 1, 2023 at 1:00 PM in English and November 2, 2023 at 1:00 PM in French.

#### Contact Information

* For information, please contact:
	+ Christine Seguin (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ christine.seguin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
